addTokenButton.ariaAddToken: Add {tokenSymbol} to your wallet watch list
addTokenButton.ariaPending: Adding {tokenSymbol} to your wallet watch list

notFound.description: Sorry! We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

buttons.secondary: How to Run a Session Node

information.title: Getting test {tokenSymbol}
information.communityDescription: If you were part of the Session Token Community <link>Snapshot</link> taken on {snapshotDate}, you are eligible to receive test {tokenSymbol}. Connect to {connectionOptions}, and then connect your wallet or enter your wallet address manually. If your eligibility is confirmed, test {tokenSymbol} will be sent to this address.
information.oxenDescription: If you registered for the <link>{oxenProgram}</link> by {oxenRegistrationDate}, you are also eligible. Connect the wallet that you registered for the program with, or enter the wallet address manually. If your eligibility is confirmed, test {tokenSymbol} will be sent to this address.
information.walletRequirementDescription: You need to have a minimum of {minimumGasAmount} test {gasTokenSymbol} on the {testNetworkChain} network to be able to receive test {tokenSymbol}. Add some to your wallet using the {recommendedGasFaucetLink}.
information.notEligible: Not eligible? {testnetName} and its Incentive Program is currently closed to the public, however we will be inviting new users to join our testnet in the future. Join {discordServerLink} to stay in the loop about opportunities to join the {incentiveProgramLink}.

faucet.connectedWalletInfo: Your connected wallet's account {address} is being used to fill out this form. You will not be asked to make any transactions.
faucet.addTokenInfo: Make {tokenSymbol} visible in your wallet by manually importing the token.

form.inputAria: Enter your wallet address to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
form.connectWalletButtonAria: Connect your wallet to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
form.connectedWalletButtonAria: Connected to wallet, click to disconnect.
form.lowEthBalance: It looks like you don't have enough test {gasTokenSymbol} on {testNetworkChain}, go to {recommendedGasFaucetLink} to get some. You have {gasAmount} test {gasTokenSymbol}

submitButton.continueAria: Continue to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
submitButton.checkingEligibilityAria: Checking if you are eligible to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
submitButton.sendingTokensAria: Sending test {tokenSymbol} to your wallet address.

error.invalidAddress: Wallet address is not valid. It must be a valid {ethTokenSymbol} address: {example}
error.incorrectChain: Faucet only works on {testnetName}, switch to {testNetworkChain} network to use the faucet.
error.faucetGasWarning: Faucet is low on gas, Please {contactSupportLink} for assistance.
error.faucetTokenWarning: Faucet is low on {tokenSymbol}, Please {contactSupportLink} for assistance.
error.invalidService: The {service} account you connected was not part of the community snapshot on {snapshotDate} and is not eligible for testnet access.
error.invalidOxen: This wallet address was not registered for the {oxenProgram} on {oxenRegistrationDate} and is not eligible for testnet access. Try connecting with Discord or Telegram instead.
error.alreadyUsedService: The connected {service} account has already been used to claim testnet {tokenSymbol} for another wallet address.
error.alreadyUsed: The connected wallet address has already been used to claim testnet {tokenSymbol}.
error.authFailed: {service} authentication failed. Please refresh the page and try again.

form.transactionHashDescription: Transaction hash of the faucet transaction.

chainBanner.unsupportedChain: You are currently on an unsupported chain. <link>Click here to switch chain</link>
chainBanner.mainnetNotLive: {mainnetName} is not live yet. <link>Click here to switch to {testnetName}</link>

openNodes.title: Open Session Nodes
openNodes.description: Nodes that are open for staking. <link>Learn more</link>
openNodes.noNodesP1: There are currently no Open Session Nodes available to stake to.
openNodes.noNodesP2: Check out the <link>docs</link> to learn about setting up and registering your own Session Node.
openNodes.landingP1: Click on an Open Session Node to stake SENT and earn rewards.
openNodes.landingP2: Want to run your own Session Node? <link>Find out how</link>.
openNodes.learnMoreButtonAria: Navigate to the Session Node documentation page.

stakedNodes.title: My Stakes
stakedNodes.noWalletP1: You currently have no wallet connected.
stakedNodes.noWalletP2: Click the <link>Connect</link> button to view your staked Session node.
stakedNodes.noNodesP1: You have no staked Session Nodes.
stakedNodes.noNodesP2: Click the <link>Stake Now</link> button to stake to an open node or register a new Session node.
stakedNodes.stakeNowButtonAria: Navigate to the staking page to stake to an open node.

dailyRewards.title: Daily Node Rewards
dailyRewards.description: The current daily rewards for running one node. <link>Learn more</link>

totalRewards.title: Total Rewards Earned
totalRewards.description: The total amount of lifetime rewards earned from staking. <link>Learn more</link>

unclaimedTokens.title: Unclaimed Tokens
unclaimedTokens.description: The total amount of rewards that have not been claimed yet. <link>Learn more</link>

general.publicKeyDescription: The identifier for the Session Node.
general.operatorAddressTooltip: The wallet address of the node operator.
general.operatorFeeDescription: The percentage of rewards the operator takes before splitting the rest with contributors.

staking.stakedBalanceDescription: Your total staked {tokenSymbol} in the node.
staking.minimumContributionDescription: Minimum amount of {tokenSymbol} that can be staked to this node.
staking.maximumContributionDescription: Maximum amount of {tokenSymbol} that can be staked to this node.
staking.stakedAmountDescription: Amount of {tokenSymbol} staked to this node.

register.description: Please start the registration process from your client or select from the list of open Session Node.

node.title: Stake to a Node
node.contributorsTooltip: The contributors currently staking to this node.

viewButton.ariaLabel: View the node details in the side panel

registerButton.ariaLabel: View the node registration details in the side panel

staked.lastUptimeDescription: The last time the node provided a proof of availability.
staked.lastRewardHeightDescription: Last block height the node received rewards.
staked.unlockingTimerDescription: Time left until the node is unlocked. After unlocking, you can withdraw your stake.
staked.deregistrationTimerDescription: Time left until the node is deregistered and funds are locked for {time}.
staked.liquidationDescription: The node is inactive and waiting to be removed by the network.
